modName: Bard Flute Music - My Little Pony
summary: Replaces the bard flute music with tunes from \"My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic\".
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the bard flute music with tunes from \"My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic\".

These new bard tunes are played on the pennywhistle, the same instrument as the original bard flute music in Skyrim. MODERATORS PLEASE NOTE: These are original recordings by the mod author, not material ripped from a copyrighted source.

Video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1HJCaZaF_TE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1HJCaZaF_TE[/url]

You might also like:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3031]Bard Flute Music - K-On[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4149]Bard Flute Music - Touhou[/url]

==Installation instructions==
Unzip the file into your Skyrim install directory. It should merge the \'Data\' directory in the zip with the one in the Skyrim directory. By default, your Skyrim directory is here:

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

==Uninstall==
Delete the six files from \\skyrim\\Data\\sound\\fx\\mus\\bard\\flute.

==Note to mod authors==
You have express permission to use these flute tracks in your own mods. Sneak it in as an easter egg.
author: JackDigital

files.name: Bard Flute Music - My Little Pony
